ExtraDecomposers.about_characters: There are such following characters in this play as a few people and different unusual characters.  They live in very unusual world and often collide with different unusual events. There is such character as Woman-devil living on the bottom of Pacific ocean and creating many perfect wonders using her magical forces. Anything she creates with defined purpose.

Author's words: Helen has woken up in the middle of the night. She is laying on her bed and suddenly she is noticing that Beatriz is flying in the room with her glowing wigs. The wigs are lighting Beatriz’s body.

Helen: Beatriz!? Is this you? What happened?

Beatriz: You got me from your sea and put into the grass in the garden. This solution was fallacy, Helen.

Helen: I thought you had died.

Beatriz: You were wrong. Did you outright quite? You said there is danger from your relentless dog and so I had not to be out from the aquarium when you did not oversaw me. I was laying circa the tree for sometime. You tolerated me to be out of the tank for this time!

Helen: I did not outright quite. You seemed like you had died. I thought it was really so. I'm sorry. I beg you not to keep you offense on me and not to daunt me with this view more.

Beatriz: Did it really seemed as if I was died?

Helen: It was my own thought.

Beatriz: Exactly it was your own wrong thought. I was not died. When you put me into your grass you hereby subjected me danger which refers to your dog! My life will be threatened if you follow your conclusions like this.

Helen: I am sorry. Your words were instructive for me.

Beatriz: You must not do this anymore! We must talk about something else. It refers to living in your aquarium.

Helen: Is this something wrong with living here? When I deflate water from the tank I carry about my pets for nobody being suffered. I regularly change water in the tank and feed you according to Christian's instructions about food you need. What do not you like in your life?

Beatriz: It may be jarring for you to hear it from me, but I must admit it is not perfect. I am going to explain why it is so. It is because the space in the aquarium is confined comparing with the space in the ocean and the swamp. Another disadvantage is that my best friend has been leaving in the swamp. But there are some advantages regarding living in your aquarium. While I was living among animals in nature I obtained livelihoods for myself. Here I don’t have to care about it.

Helen: You can live in such place where you want. There are no problem. What place have you liked most of all?

Beatriz: There is one fact about a place and another fact about my friendship with Darma. She was my best friend in the swamp. I can say she was indispensable and I miss her. Can you bring me to the swamp some day?

Helen: Unfortunately, I do not know where it is. Maybe you know how to reach this place?

Beatriz: You conjured me to stay away from your ruthless dog when you do not oversaw me. I have understood you insist me to be always in the aquarium and never out. You permit me to be out of the tank only when you are near me and I am in safety with you. I am not sure I can find the way from here to the swamp. It is not so little distance. I do not precisely remember how I flew from the swamp to the ocean. I talked with passers, they told me how to reach the ocean. The way was long and not easy. Marine animals conducted me from the ocean to the river which enters into the ocean. Somehow the way is long and the trip would be long and it must be not easy.

Helen: I can care about your safety when you are out of the aquarium. There are some moments when Junior is in its shack. We can find the way from here to the swamp. I can by or ask somebody to give me a map about our terrain as a favor. There are negotiable maps about land space. When we will have found out the ways we will go where we will need to go. We will go to the swamp by some transport.

Beatriz: Thank you very much! I had a great desire to see the world out of the swamp and so I had to leave my friends in the swamp. But now I feel a lack of them.

Helen: Tell me, do you like animals in the tank?

Beatriz: Yes. They are good.

Helen: It is wonderful. Is our deal regards journey to the swamp dire? Simply I am a bit busy now. I have important occasions. But we surely will decide your affair regarding the journey to the swamp.

Beatriz: What press me it is such disparity: I had good friends in the swamp, but I wanted to see the world and so I had to leave the swamp and go to the ocean. It costed me friendship. Besides I must live in nature according to my live purpose.

Helen: Do you pity that I took you over to my aquarium?

Beatriz: I wanted to see what is in an aquarium. But it has turned out it is not so far-flung space.

Helen: It is understandably. I will do anything you can be in the swamp and see your friend again. Tell me please, are you intend to go to the swamp forever or for some time only?

Beatriz: I went to you only for some time to see hydrosphere in the aquarium. Now I must tell you something important. I am such being whose mission is to save nature from the global pollution. According to the assignment beings of our species wipe nature litter such as carrion out. So we have place in nature where there is excess of carrion. I have features regarding my human form and nous and because of it sometimes I can be out of my real place in nature.

Helen: Then I have something to tell you about an ocean. You must know it is not so safely in there. I would not recommend you to live in the ocean albeit I have representation how wonderful it is there. But it is dangerous to live in the ocean and you are in safety in the aquarium. There are a lot of not less ruthless animals than Junior in the ocean. They are predatory animals. Junior is a clever dog according to how I presume who understands that you are my alive pet and not his booty. Besides he always has what to eat in his bowl. There are no implications such these for predatory animals. They relentlessly assault on other animals. You would better to retreat from it. I would like you to live in my aquarium and us to go to the swamp sometimes where you would meet your friend according to your desire.

Beatriz: Beings of our species are poisonous and a threat for the predatory animals not less than the predatory animals for us. If a predatory animal eats somebody of us it will cost its live. Sorry, I did not tell you earlier that I am poisonous. I did not think that people do not like poisonous beings. But I am not dangerous for you and pets in your aquarium. I can poison water space only if there is some danger for me.

Helen: Do they understand this threat?

Beatriz: I communicated with scientists who learn our species and they told there are different predatory animals. Some of them understand the threat and some do not understand. At least I will try keep away from them as far as it will be possible if I live in the ocean. In the last resort I will defeat myself from them poisoning the water space which will be location of mine and a predator. Somehow there is my mission not only in the swamp and so it can have place in the ocean. Now I want us to discuss our trip to the swamp. I am not planning my emigration to the ocean for now.

Helen: If you do not live in my aquarium I will miss you very much. I am so glad you are alive! In the same time I am so sorry I put you circa the tree. And imagine if you after that fly away from me to the ocean where it is dangerous to live and we do not see each other anymore!

Beatriz: May I ask you why you have covered the aquarium? I understand you about danger from your dog. I presume you have covered the aquarium with such purpose me can not fly from it and risk my life? But you have just posited Junior is enough clever to assault me.

Helen: Please, sorry. I do not want you to take offense at me, but Christian imposed me this idea. He wanted me to assure your security. So I was compelled to make hurdles for you to fly from the aquarium when you are not under my care. Sorry me, Beatriz, but I still have been worrying about your safety according to Christian's opinion and for this reason I intend to cover the aquarium.

Beatriz: I would like to know if your dog is enough clever and if bright colors of my wigs would tell him that it is not good for him to assault me.

Helen: Today I had such thought maybe Junior would bark hectically if it saw you. Dogs like to bark at unfamiliar people and some pets like cats and dogs. Albeit you are not a human, cat or dog, you are unfamiliar and conspicuous live object for Junior and it would be a good reason for Junior to bark at you. I am not sure if it would have to hunt at you or not. Somehow, I think it will be better for you and it not to see each-other. Now lets get into the aquarium again. I will oversaw you while you will be returning into water.

Beatriz: Lets go.

Christian: Hi, Helen!

Helen: Hi, Christian! How are you, your work?

Christian: Stable.

Helen: Is it interesting?

Christian: Of course, it is.

Helen: Wonderful. How are your parents?

Christian: My parents are hitherto glad about my sensational features albeit they have their own life like I have.

Helen: What do they engage?

Christian: My parents are in New York where we had been living until they divorced. My mother works in New York as a secretary. My dad is in a hospital. He has not good health. As you know I live here with my grandma and grandpa. I do my work as a professional scientist. I work with live nature. How are Judy and Cassandra?

Helen: Judy is a little hectic about her studying. The subjects she learns are not very easy for internalization. She is a little nervous about her exams.

Christian: I know what is the subject she is learning. I am agree they are not very easy, but I hope she will successfully cope with her exams.

Helen: I hope so, too. Cassandra has no particular challenges in studying. She will graduate next year. Sometimes when they are not very busy I see them. They go to me and we talk.

Christian: I liked them. I see they are to a certain degree interested in such things in which I am interested.

Mrs Jakins: Hi, Helen! Nice to see you. How are you?

Helen: Hello, Mrs Jakins. I am stable as usual.

Mrs Jakins: I have not been seeing you for a long time, Helen. Will you tell me how are your affairs, about your friends and relatives?

Helen: The most specific news is that I have had a new extra-ordinary pet. Did you hear about it? Other my news you will find not so specific.

Mrs Jakins: Yes, I did, of course. Mr Jakins found Beatriz in a river and get acquainted with her. He likes her. I see her when he had brought her home. Do you have some other news?

Helen: I have much news. But I will be surprised if you are interested in any of them. May I tell you what I think is the most interesting?

Mrs Jakins: I would like us to talk about anything.

Christian: How are you and Beatriz?

Helen: We are going to go to the swamp where Beatriz lived earlier. I am going to by a map where I can see and learn ways to the swamp. We will go here and Beatriz will see her best friend whom she is missing. It seems her desire to see her friend is amplifying every day. I want it happened too. Recently I felt dejection when I thought Beatriz had died. I saw her laying on the bottom of my aquarium and wrapped into her wigs. Fortunately, I was wrong. it was a dormancy, not demise.

Christian: Did you feed her according to how I told you?

Helen: Yes, of course. It was not very pleasant to make feed of carrion but what could I do other?

Christian: Do you see? Such beings are not intended to be kept in an aquarium of a human. But Beatriz wanted to live in your aquarium for some time and so you had to take her over. I think she will leave you soon because she has to live in nature and perform her mission. It is what she was created for.

Helen: Yes, I know. I spoke with her and she told me about it.

Christian: I wish you and Beatriz have a lucky way to the swamp.

Helen: Thank you. You told me earlier about such creatures as Beatriz. I was impressed. I am glad you have so interesting job. We can speak about it else.

Christian: Yes, it is true that Beatriz is completely extraordinary being. Besides the species is very unusual in the same time Beatriz is very unusual representative of this species. I have already said you that it is a species of decomposers. It appeared when it had became a necessaty in the world. It differs from all the other species in our world. It is a special kind of decomposers. It is a grander secret of nature. These creatures do not reproduce unlike all the other live species. There is no such fact that their dissapearing doubtlessly will turn out a disastrous. It would can happen if they dissapeared at the moment. They exist when there is a necessaty in their existence and do not exist when there is no necessaty. They do not have to reproduce. Nature generates them and there are no such concepts as forebears and descendants in their nature. They exist at such moments when there is wholesale pollution in nature. It implies such pollution level in nature when all the existing decomposers are not enough to cope with such quantity of litter. These creatures are additional decomposers and their function is refinement the contaminated plots of nature from the excess of carrion. The carrion is their main livelihoods. They are extra-decomposers, unbelieveable specific live species.

Helen: Anything of this is so interesting! It is really unusual including the fact that they appear not from their forbears. Bodies of representatives of all the live species are formed as a result of male and female cells junction. It is a well-known nature law. In the same time bodies of these unusual creatures formed as a result of something another.

Christian: Yes, so it is. Their provenance is very unusual. They are formed under secret force influence of nature. But there are some other live organisms which appear not from their forebears. As you understand Beatriz is not for living in an aquarium of somebody as a pet. She is for performing functions of a nature janitor. She was interested to see live in an aquarium because she has human mind but she did not presume it would be forever. So the aquarium is only temporary haven for her. You can let go her from your aquarium in any moment and live in the swamp.

Helen: I will miss her. She is so extra-ordinary.

Christian: But I have explained you. You have to feed her with carrion. Do you remember that?

Helen: Yes, I remember. I put gloves on my hands and a swathe with a cloth on my nose before give her the feed. I have died mices and insects, rent bodies of died mices and feed Beatriz in parts. I deflate Beatriz from the aquarium and she eats only out of it with such intention it not to be to the detriment of clean water in the aquarium and other pets.

Mrs Jakins: I would not tinker with her and this frigging feed at all.

Helen: But we are speaking about me, not about you. I hope she will not live in the ocean because it may be perilous for her. There are many predatory marine animals in the ocean.

Christian: Helen, do you know that Beatriz is poisonous? But there are not reason for you to be anxious. I warrant you there is no threat for you and your pets from Beatriz. She may be dangerous for predatory animals. She can poison space with a predator around her and kill the predator. Beatriz has bright color of wigs and it is the sign that she is poisonous. Many of predatory animals understand it and they will not assault her. This species is not for becoming victims for predators. So they have natural abilities to protect themselves from them. Besides nature has coined it in such way that predators do not have to became victims too. There must not be carrion clogging exacerbation in nature what is value of existence of these extra-decomposers. So predators must not die from extra-decomposers and extra-decomposers must live while they are performing their destination. Nothing must interrupt their existence earlier its time. We worried as if Junior had its eye on Beatriz as on a booty. When we talked about this problem I did not remember the fact that Beatriz is poisonous. So we worried about Beatriz's live it not to be threatened in connection with Junior. I do not know about dogs like your Junior if they internalize bright colors as a poison sign or they do not. If they do not than we have to worry about Junior's life more than about Beatriz's life. I know predatory animals understand that such bright color means that the animal is poison and dangerous with the poison. But pet dogs are other thing.

Helen: Will Beatriz be in safety in every place?

Christian: Anyway I think Beatriz would not allow somebody not except Junior to take away her life.

Helen: I value both Junior and Beatriz. I must not admit them to see each other.

Mrs Jakins: Oh, Helen, Helen. Do you not find it nasty? I find it abhorrent!

Helen: What do you find abhorrent?

Mrs Jakins: I would not keep such beings among my pets. I find it a bit strange that there are 2 such properties in one being when it has human mind and in the same time it eats carrion. I listen about such strange creature the first time in my life! I am a bit amazed that Andy likes them.

Helen: I am agree with you. It is strange. But in the same time it is cool because it is so unusual!

Christian: We can not say it is their inferiority that they eat carrion. It corresponds their nature.

Mrs Jakins: But I am a little daunted in connection with existence of so unusual creatures fact. I would only spurn them from me. To be frankly I am just struck by these species. It is something stunning!

Christian: I have already told you about them and you have no reason to worry about it, grandma.

Mrs Jakins: Are you sure you are right?

Christian: I communicated with such creatures and they told me and other my collegues about themselves. It is my job, grandma.

Mrs Jakins: You said they exist when there is a necessaty in their existence and do not exist when there is no necessaty? Will you say existence of such creatures would not be perpetuated?

Christian: They are existing while they performing their mission. After that the existence will be ceased.

Helen: I wish you to be successfull in your deal in this life not only when their existance is ceased.

Christian: Oh, thank you. Besides I am thankful to government for I have gotten rights of an adult human in age of three years.

Mrs Jakins: Anything of it is very unusual, of course. Frankly I am a little hectic about all these facts. So I was hectic about your features, Christian. I have never seen such kids as you before. Your feature is what transgresses human mind nature! But otherwise it is wonderful you understand why. We had to take care of you only for 3 years. After that you were an adult human instead to be a little kid. You can work and have aptitudes to be responsible for yourself prematurely! It was terrifyingly and wonderful in the same time! It is so jarring that I do not even know how I evaluate it at least.

Helen: I am glad Christian has a possibility to continue his scientific carrier in this life after the previous life!

Christian: Of course. I outright quitted in my previous life learning the extra-decomposers subject. I was a scientist fond with the science very much in my previous life such as in this life. But, unfortunately, it turned out that I had not enough strong mind. Now I am in this life with sterling mind to do what I was not lucky to do in the previous life. Now I have ideal mind. Nothing will impede me to reach anything what I must reach.

Helen: What does it mean you had not enough strong mind?

Christian: The science subject was so extra-ordinary. Of course it is by forces not for every scientist. A scientist must have a very strong mentality for working in a such area.

Helen: I believe in you. I believe you have omnipotence in your current life.

Mrs Jakins: Yes, Christian, it seems as it is such grander sensation that you are so amazing kid that you must be famous while you are living and posthumously so much, too.

Christian: It is a purpose of my current life. If you are interested very much I have to say you that appearance of extra-decomposers is connected with one terrible fact about something happening in nature.

Mrs Jakins: Christian! It will only exacerbate my turmoil feelings!

Christian: Then I can postpone sharing this gen.

Mrs Jakins: Can you never told it me?

Christian: I think you all will know about it soon anyway.

Part 1.8.Author's words: Helen is meeting Judy and Cassandra as her guests. They are discussing their holidays

Part 1.8.Helen: Hi, girls. How do you do? Judy, how were your last exams and tests? Have you terminated all of them?

Part 1.8.Judy: Yes, I have, but this studying was so tiresome the last time!

Part 1.8.Helen: What marks?

Part 1.8.Judy: A, B and C.

Part 1.8.Helen: I believed in you! You have passed all the exams in this session! I am hailing you!

Part 1.8.Judy: Thank you! How are you, Helen, how is Beatriz?

Part 1.8.Helen: She is glad. I am glad, too. We went to the swamp where she lived earlier. She saw her best friend frog which she had missed before her life in my tank. I bought a map where I can learn ways to the swamp. Sam brought us there and back with his car. It was a far distance. It turned out that he is brilliant in the space we crossed! He contemplated the map, took a look at the swamp and we came without fallacies. Thank you for interest.

Part 1.8.Cassandra: Do you see how wonderful is to have such friends who can help with the far trip?

Part 1.8.Helen: Yes, of course, I see I and Beatriz are lucky with Sam.

Part 1.8.Judy: See, Beatriz will muster infection and muck in the swamp again. Did you think that there must be many deleterious bacterias in the swamp?

Part 1.8.Helen: I hold her when there are rubber sterilizing gloves on my hands. I washed Beatriz when we had arrived at home.

Part 1.8.Judy: I am so glad that she turned out alive! I would like you to transfer her my regrets about how crass I was with her.

Part 1.8.Helen: Well, I will do that.

Part 1.8.Cassandra: I am glad, too, but to be frankly I am hitherto a little overwhelmed by her existence.

Part 1.8.Helen: It is possible to tame such creatures and it was not difficult in my case, but, unfortunately, they are not for keeping at home by people. Neither me nor Christian have not told you yet about the species Beatriz belongs to. Its existence is connected with one grander but unpleasant event on our planet. They are performing their mission to prevent a catastrophic aftermath. They eat carrion which contaminates nature. So they have to live in nature and not to be pets. So I will have to relinquish Beatriz.

Part 1.8.Cassandra: It is lamentable thing that you will have to part.

Part 1.8.Judy: Of course, it is negative news. But besides that I am worrying about the catastrophe which you have just mentioned.

Part 1.8.Helen: Recently I made a visit to Christian and he mentioned it. But there was his grandma with us. She demanded him not to tell about the catastrophe because she was hectic about that. So I did not listen about it and I do not know what a catastrophe is it.

Part 1.8.Judy: The fact about the catastrophe is not sumptuously, of course, but I would like to know about it and know that it will be not global.

Part 1.8.Helen: Extra-decomposers are for caveat nature to escape catastrophe. In essence they are hatched in the world for this purpose and with no other one. In reality Beatriz is not a mermaid. Maybe you have already understood it, maybe not. At leastways she is not a mermaid like all the mermaids about which we could listen in fairy-tales. She is a particular scavenger. The species Beatriz belongs to is called extra-decomposers but wherein Beatriz is a specific representative of this species. She has some essential differences from other representatives of this species. When they do what they are doing they will disappear from the world.

Part 1.8.Judy: Do you imply their existence is not perpetual?

Part 1.8.Helen: Yes, of course.

Part 1.8.Judy: It is very specific and more depressing. All the live species have other existence limit. Is the mission of such beings as Beatriz refinement some places on our planet from the carrion overage?

Part 1.8.Helen: Of course, it is as I said. They are called extra-decomposers and have mission of nature janitors. This mission is refinement nature from a global carrion pollution.

Part 1.8.Cassandra: Does Beatriz presume to have a perpetual abode or she presumes to live everywhere if there is carrion?

Part 1.8.Helen: I do not know exactly but I think she pretends to live in some other different places. I see she has interest to see the world in many different places. I think she will not want to live in some other aquarium of some other people because it is too tight for her. It is a disadvantage of life in my aquarium albeit I think it is enough cumbersome for such quantity of inhabitants of such size.

Part 1.8.Cassandra: When extra-decomposers disappear will it be a demise from famine?

Part 1.8.Helen: Oh, I have just found that I have never touched on this question in the conversation with Christian. Nobody of my acquainted can know it better than he does. But I have understood that extra-decomposers are going to be superfluous part of anything alive in our planet when they complete their mission.

Part 1.8.Cassandra: How long will they exist?

Part 1.8.Helen: Alas, I do not know that, too.

Part 1.8.Cassandra: I found it is a pity that Beatriz has to leave you and, perhaps, live not so long as we. She is such a sweety!

Part 1.8.Judy: But I hope the holidays will be very invigorating. It is so unusual and intriguingly! Le’s plan our holidays!

Part 1.8.Cassandra: Oh, yes. I am fully-baked. it is so wonderful that holidays are coming!

Part 1.8.Judy: I am fully-baked, too.

Part 1.8.Helen: Yes, of course we must do it. Judy, I understand you are tired with your studying and I presume you are tired, too, Cassandra. I presume the holidays will take place on a sun beach. We will go to a resort city and rent housing near a beach.

Part 1.8.Cassandra: It is wonderful! I have so great inclination to go to beaches at summer time!

Part 1.8.Helen: I would like us to go to Miami. Besides the beach there is an engrossing water museum in this city. I am going to tell you about a marine game. The game is carried out in huge aquariums in the museums of Miami. There are many different games which are carried out in the immense aquariums. The players are entitled to put on diving suits and get into the aquariums where they take part of the game. Every player takes a basket before game starting. When I read about them in magazines, I had such impression that they are akin some sport games. I read about not to say immense plethora of games but I am very interested of them and I think you will like it, too. I can tell you about some of those games in particular. Many of them have similarities. It is that they are based on quick movement in the water. The principle is following. We plunge into water and sit on the backs of dolphins and merpeople and wear to them with cohesive chains. There will be some bright objects quickly moving in different directions in the water discarded by a game leader. We purport to catch the objects earlier than our foes. So our marine inhabitants will serve us as a vehicles. They will sweep in the water and their purpose is to obtain such vantage point where we can reach out our hand and touch the object. We will have to strive reach the object and touch it according to our purpose and put it in the basket. So we purport to muster as many objects as we can. There will be some hurdles for the movement to be easy in hurry. There will be such hurdles as some objects we will must sweep past and not offend. The objects will be such as dustbins and rattlesnakes, but they will be not natural. They are only called so. They are such objects only from the game vantage point. But the players must not offend no one of them and if somebody bumps in some of these object he or she will exit from the game. Every caught object gives one or two points to the player catching hold it dependently of size of the object. In this game we all are rivals for each-other. But we can play with (teams) commands and then the commands will play roles of opponents for each-other.

Part 1.8.Judy: I have understood that the beings who will serve us as vehicles be responsible for our achievements?

Part 1.8.Helen: Of course. This is their game, too. There was such caveat where I read about the games that these beings have not weak vigor what serves them giving aptitudes to quick speed in this game. Also I read they are not being enfeebled during a long game time. So we must hold on tight with them. But if somebody topples it is not so tangible negative as bumping. The player who will topple be returned back with help of his live vehicle.

Part 1.8.Judy: Are the dustbins reeking?

Part 1.8.Helen: Rather no than yes. They are not natural and the game is played in the water. Besides people who play in this game breath with air stored in the diving helmets, as you know. So they can not feel smell which pertain water.

Part 1.8.Cassandra: It is very wonderful, but I am a little anxious about these facts pertaining this game.

Part 1.8.Helen: I will mollify your turmoil feelings. I think I have already read about this game and understood that there is no necessity for players of having very strong nerves. You will be clutched with the animal with a cohesive nexus. The nexuses are used with the purpose of reducing falling possibility. To say more you will not suffer tangibly if you topple from your vehicle. The game will be played in water where anything falls not very quickly. If you reach the bottom in your falling you will not be injured. May be your quick live vehicle will have catch you before you fly to the bottom. You will only have to climb onto its back. Anyway it is a large possibility that you will not be injured because it is going on in water and the nexus are used to help the players to return on their diving spaces. Sometimes it seems to me such game will be an indispensable entertainme.

Part 1.8.Cassandra: Yes, I think it will be very invigorating. If the marine vehicles moved slowly the game would be less enthralling.

Part 1.8.Author's words: Judy, Helen and Cassandra stay in the garden in a tree-shade. Lovely warm day, in the middle of May, sunshine, sounds of birds and aroma of flowers. The bell rings at the door. An unknown man enters the house. He is is tall, with large expressive eyes, of indeterminate age. He wears summer t-shirt and a cowboy hat.

Part 1.8.Helen: (Surprised) Hi! How can I help you?

Part 1.8.James McHein: Let me introduce myself. I am an acquaintance of Christian and an old friend of Beatriz. May I visit her?

Part 1.8.Helen: Yes, you are welcome, she will be here soon. By the way, are you a biologist, like Christian?

Part 1.8.James McHein: No, I am not a biologist. I would like to wait for Beatriz to come and then tell you more about myself.

Part 1.8.Helen: FIne, I will go pick her up from the  aquarium.

Part 1.8.Author's words: Helen disappears in the house. James, Judy and Cassandra look surprised at each other. Helen appears with Beatriz on her shoulder.

Part 1.8.Beatriz: OMG! James, what are you doing here!!! Was it really necessary for you to come here?

Part 1.8.James McHein: Yes, it was. I must tell everything to the girls, as we need their cooperation.

Part 1.8.Beatriz: But they are just planning holidays and having a nice time. Is this necessary to stress them so much right now?

Part 1.8.James McHein: I have been sent for a mission. You know it. So I would not make it done unless it was really a must.

Part 1.8.Helen: What??? WWWWHAAT? Please, can someone explain to me what is going on here in God’s name?

Part 1.8.James McHein & Beatriz: Yes, please sit down so as not to fall, Helen. We know each other for a while.

A swan approvals such visits independently from the host. He does not know about the devil living in the lake albeit the lake appertain him like the court and the house. This letter was delivered to you by one of the swans which live in the demesne of this human. Anything of these words is sheer true.

Hi, Christian.

Beatriz: She is not among people. She lives in the lake among marine animals. It is not indecent in the underwater world.

Judy: Does the woman-devil have wigs to move in water and air like you?

Beatriz: I have never seen she had wigs, but I know she can change imaginary.

Christian: Where she is from and how this information about the woman-devil is connected with extra-decomposers?

Beatriz: She has flew from some place, but I don't know exactly from which one. She has created the extra-decomposers with her cryptic forces.

Christian: I have insatiable desire to engage science very often, but I do not think devil ordinances must be included in my science.

Beatriz: Why?

Christian: Because the science as engagement of a scientist is one activity area and this devil magic is entirely other area.

Beatriz: But I am not agree with this.

Christian: Thank you very much for your proposal, but I want you understand me. You are just one of the specific wonderful creatures in nature. I am a professional scientist. I know about science and job of a scientist tangibly more than you. I know what ideas I must admit and what ideas I must not. Please, don't take offense at me. I do not need information about provenance of extra-decomposers if it is based on magic. Learning their anatomy, lifestyle, roles executed by them and their place in nature - this is what is actual for scientists like me.

Cassandra: I knew that you, Beatriz, would have to induce to persuade Christian to go.

Judy: But I want go with you.

Beatriz: No problems if you have a possibility to mine a diving suit. You can sit on a big swan and fly to the lake. You must do it not from the side of the house. The swan will brought you right. So you don't have to worry.

Judy: But I have no possibility to mine a diving suit. Can I talk with the woman-devil out of the lake?

Beatriz: I will have to negotiate with her about it. Do you see, there is necessaty to hide from eyes of the hosts. So you will have to talk somewhere in the court where the hosts will not see you. Somewhere near the lake behind the trees.

Author's words: Judy, Beatriz and Woman-devil take part in this part. Judy is visiting Woman-devil's living place and meet her together with Beatriz. Beatriz and Judy negotiated that Beatriz would wrote to Woman-devil a letter where she would discuss date, time and place of meeting. Before Judy came her friends were not squared off by the question about Judy's walking to Woman-devil.

Cassandra: Judy, you are so brave!

Judy: Do you think there is a jeopardy to accept the idea to go thither?

Cassandra: Do you see, devil is associated with evil for human. It was said in our recent conversation.

Judy: But I don't trust this prejudices. I do not like your tumult, but I like the idea. I have Beatriz who warants that there is no serious menace for us. Let her be responsible for her words. And Resignation is the one what remains to you.

Cassandra: It is like you have impression scarcity.

Judy: I don't have impression fertility . I will not abdicate the unusual intriguing proposal of Beatriz. I think it will be something just pulsatile to meet with those who created the extradecomposers! They are interesting creatures! So it is such eagerness ! Beatriz has already send a letter to Woman-devil. In this letter she asked her such some questions which imply the information which can help successfully to plan our meeting.

Helen: You will be a great connoiseur possessing knowledges in the extra-decomposers area, won't you?

Judy: Maybe, but now I am not planning became a scientist like Christian.

Author's words: A little time later Judy and Beatriz met each-other and talk about the trip to Woman-devil. Beatriz told Judy about such aspects as date, time and place of meeting. There were a few dates when the host would be not at home. Beatriz said that Judy that she could go in any of them.

Beatriz: There is a necessarity that the host did not see us.

Judy: Why it is so?

Beatriz: According to the Woman-devil's words precense of extraneous people can summon host's backlash.

Judy: It is strange. What is wrong with this host?

Beatriz: You know, you do not know, of course, the host is not absolutely adequate. But do not worry, please. Also you do not know how strong is Woman-devil. She will defense you from any psycho. But what should  we talk about it if he will not be at home when we go.

Judy: There are some interesting questions for me. Is it so dirty in the lake as in the swamp

Beatriz: No, of course, it is not. I told that it is not so dirty in this lake. Have you forgotten?

Judy: Yes. You told. I have forgotten. I am sorry.

Beatriz: Not so big trouble. Do not hold it in your mind so sensually

Judy: And other question. Will Woman-devil be unclad in our meeting? I do not want it was so.

Beatriz: Well, I'll write her with a polite request not to be unclad in front of you. More precisely you will write under my dictation because I can not write, а course.

Author's words: Judy and Beatriz met Woman-devil near Judy's living place. Woman-devil arrived there on her horse. Of course, it was an appalling acquaintance for Judy. She saw that Woman-devil looked not very similar to a usual human. She looked like Beatriz described her in the conversation with Judy and her friends. But Woman-devil was not like an ugly scarecrow. Also she was not very similar to a human. She was closer to an attractive toy than to a horrible monster or a human. Her figure was more similar to a figure of a toy than a human figure. Her head was not less wide than shoulders. Her height was lower than Judy's height. It reached Judy's lips. Eyes were very big and their form was more similar to circles than to form of human eyes. Accordingly to it her edge were so big. Hair was in thick and long scythe ending lower her polly. Accordingly to Judy's feelings Woman-devil's hair were very dense like toy's hair. Her polly was visibly wider than the part of her body from shoulders till waist. Woman-devil was closed in a dark swimsuit and dark cloak on her back. Beatriz presented her and Judy to each-other.

Judy: Hi, Woman-devil. Nice to meet you.

Woman-devil: For you, Lady Devil

Beatriz: I am glad you are getting acquainted. Judy, this is the Woman=devil, the person about whom I told you, Helen and Cassandra. Lady devil, This is Judy. Woman-devil is a great inhabitant on out planet. She has created indispensable remedy to defense this planet from carrion depletion.

Woman-devil: This is a very clever postulation. I can tell you, Judy, more about myself. I really have great magical forces and create my extra-decomposers through them. I gave them such title as extra-decomposers. I gqve Beatriz life. I did not create her, but I remade her. She was very ill and dead. I freed her from illness, turned her into alive, but sleepy human. After that I reduced her, added her respiratory system to breathe water and rolled up in a cocoon, created through my magical forces. Some time later I launched the cocoon. Beatriz woke up with these pretty and bright wigs and horns like wigs and horns of a butterfly. We greeted each-other and told about themselves. After that I allowed her to fly and live everywhere where she wanted. When I and Beatriz had met again she told me about her life in the your friend's aquarium, ocean, swamp and the aquarium of those abhorrent people. Now she has the debt in front of me - to play out a role of an extra-decomposer, because I helped her to aquire life 2 times. I can endue animals consciousness. So I have endued some snakes and swans. Now they understand what I want from them like people. So some swans can serve us as postmen. So I and Beatriz penned when Beatriz lived in the acquarium of your friend. Besides, as you, maybe know, I am here with one serious purpose.

Beatriz: And, as I know, you know, what purpose is it. You and all your friends whom I met know as I think. At first turn, Helen with whom I communicated about my mission and place in nature.

Judy: Yes, we know, of course.

Beatriz: And our appearance is straight related with Woman-devil. She has created us. So, the mission about which she said is to help nature through us.

Woman-devil: Yes, I am a really strong and omnipotent person. We are going to show you many wonders which are her subject.

Judy: Your omnipotence is something so great! How do you create all these extra-decomposers?

Woman-devil: I create them through my magic, of course. Do you want go with us in water of ocean?

Judy: No, I do not. Thank you. I am not going, because I can not breathe water like you.

Beatriz: And you have not acquired a diving suit?

Judy: Sorry, I did not have a possibility to acquire it.

Beatriz: It is a pity that you can not plunge into underwater world with us. It is wonderful under  water.

Woman-devil: As I know people can not communicate with marine animals besides they can not breathe under water without special water accessories. If Judy can not plunge under water with us lets not to torment ourselves with this disadvantage. We can have a wonderful time out of the ocean.

Judy: Excuse me, Lady Devil. Did you intend to invite me to be on meeting with you in ocean except in the lake?

Woman-devil: No, you are not entirely right. There was no invitation to go to lake. There was only my suggestion to visit a part of ocean. I, Beatriz and many other animals now live in ocean. We have our confined with a border part in ocean. There a lot of other different marine animals live in this part with us. We are a big friendly company. Moreover, I was born in the bottom of the ocean. There I have been living during whole my life.

Judy: But Beatriz told that there are swans who swim on the surface of the water space where you live now. She said that it is possible to fly to you using the swans as transport.

Woman-devil: There is a lake not far from our ocean and there are swans. But I did not have such suggestion as to visit water in this lake. I had only such suggestion for you as to visit our part of ocean and see our world. But because you can not to admit this suggestion, I and Beatriz will tell you about our world. It is Pacific ocean and we have to live there near its banks because there are some dishonest people living right there. The nature is contaminated very much. The banks are contaminated too much with different litter and yuck. It is really appallingly and abhorrent! But I see so incentive to work in my wonderful guys extra-decomposers as it must be. I am very glad how they do what they must do.

Judy: May I ask what is the border of?

Woman-devil: The border is a steal high thick lattice with big cells. It is a very high lattice and was built by me with help of many marine animals. I can negotiate with different marine animals. There are no predators in our confined world. It is very peaceful there. We negotiated to separate the space and live separately from predatory animals. The space is enough far-flung and it is spaciously for us including Beatriz who does not like little close space. The lattice is only about 1 meter not enough to the surface of the ocean.

Judy: May I interest what marine animals helped you in building this lattice?

Judy: It is impressive. Does Beatriz leave this place by swimming through a cell of the lattice to walk out of it?

Woman-devil: Yes, she does. It is interesting for her.

Judy: Does she seek any adventures?

Woman-devil: As I understand, she does.

Judy: What is very interesting what are these adventures? Maybe Beatriz longs for some adventures where is a gravity for life of creatures like her?

Beatriz: No, nothing like this! You understand quite wrong, Judy! I just see the underwater world and communicate with different marine inhabitants. I do not seek perilous adventures.

Judy: And what do you talk with them about?

Beatriz: I talk with them about different things like life in the ocean regarding different aspects such as life style of these animals, their reproducing, nurturing their youngs and many things like these. Please, do not worry about me. I beg you.

Judy: I thought you live in a lake, but now I know you live not in a lake, you live in an ocean. It is what induced Helen to worry about you. I remember you said the part of ocean where you live is fenced by a big and thick lattice, but who knows what else? You said you like seeking adventures out of these your living part of ocean. Who knows how buxom this fence is? You want say you can warrant that no predators can disturbance the lattice and reach you?

Woman-devil: I can warrant that I have enough strong magic forces to create enough buxom obstraction of predators.

Judy: Where have you got the building material steal from?

Woman-devil: From a material factory.

Judy: And how is it related with your magic forces?

Woman-devil: There is very much what I can tell you. Lets sit on my horse and go to the bank of the ocean and I will give you much information.

Author's words: Woman-devil, Judy and Beatriz sat on the horse's back and moved to the way.

Judy: Lady Devil, have you ever had wigs and flew through them?

Woman-devil: Yes, I had. I can do with myself what I have done with Beatriz but not reducing myself. If I want fly like a butterfly I roll myself in a cocoon and sleep in it. The cocoon hangs on a branch of a very big and strong wood. When I wake up I unwrap the cocoon and have big wigs and horns like a butterfly. I can fly moving my wigs so much as I want. Also I can discard them

Judy: Cool! And they drown in the ocean and lay on its bottom?

Woman-devil: No, they just dissapear.

Judy: What are we going to the ocean for?

Woman-devil: Do not you want go there?

Judy: I do not confront this idea, but I am interested why we are going there. I said that I can not span class="from_vocabulary">imbue into the ocean.

Woman-devil: I thought you wanted be close to the ocean, the present refuge of mine and Beatriz.

Beatriz: We had such thought that if you can not come to be in our living place then it implies that you would like to come to be near it.

Judy: Ok. Lets do so.

Woman-devil: I will tell you about me and our life on the way. But I must warn you that you, may be will understand not everything clearly. But do not be distressed if it is so. Now I am answering your last question. You asked how my magic forces are related with strength of the fencing. So I am explaining you, but at first I must say that it may be very puzzling for you. You as a human may not understand much. I hope you will be satisfied by the information which you will get from me. Well, what is related with my forces and this lattce - both are related in reality. Forces like mine let make buildings very buxom. They can influence phisical laws and as a result my buildings under my own intention. I am an embodiment from the hereafter. So I can do very much. There is no disparity from my view-point. You were right when you talked about my omnipotence, because I am not a simple human. I am a devil in human female imagery from the hereafter. I have a very grander mission in this world and it is for favor for your universe with life planet.

Beatriz: Judy knows that it is for favor for this world. I remember I, Judy and her friend talked about it. I remember I talked about it with Judy's friend in whose aquarium I lived. I think all her  friends know about it now

Woman-devil: What else do you want hear about?

Judy: My friend Helen whose pet Beatriz was for some time told about one abstract catastrophy alluding to Beatriz's words. What catastrophe is this?

Woman-devil: Do not worry. It is completely not your problem. Only I and, of course, my creatures which are called, as you see, extra-decomposers are responsible for this.

Judy: But what was this?

Woman-devil: People who live near the ocean in which I and Beatriz live now, do not have clear conscience and do not strive to endorse cleaness. So nature in the ocean and on its banks is contaminated very seriously. So my extra-decomposers work for refinement it.

Judy: May I ask why you have been living during whole your life in the ocean, not out of it somewhere on land?

Woman-devil: I have already known that people do not like me very much.

Author's words: The horse is hastening. Judy feels shiver.

Judy: What are we doing?

Woman-devil: We are hasting, as you see. Now we are going to fly more quickly. I have explained what for. What bothers you, Judy?

Judy: Oh, no, Woman-devil, stop it, please! I can hold! I am going to fall!

Author's words: Woman-devil is stopping the horse. Judy is breathing heavily

Beatriz: So we will have to reach for a very long time. The distance from here to the ocean is very enormous. It is measured in hundreds of kilometers.

Judy: What ocean is it?

Woman-devil: Pacific. The way will be very long if we move with so low speed.

Judy: How much time it takes for you and Beatriz on this horse when you go such distance as from the place of our meeting to the ocean?

Woman-devil: It is the first time when I go such distance. I do not know how much time the trip will take. But I am sure it will be not like a few minutes. It will takes hours.

Judy: But I am afraid so big speed. So, I think, we have to part right now if it is the one way to go to the ocean.

Woman-devil: There are 2 ways, but at the moment there is only one way - on my horse. He begins have wigs like bird wigs after distillation. It can raise and fly with them.

Judy: What is the second way?

Woman-devil: Sometimes I have wigs, too, as I told. I have wigs as if I was a gigantic butterfly. But I make my wigs only after my dreaming through the cocoon like a caterpillar. Current minutes are not my minutes for dream. So now I can not have wigs and bring you and Beatriz to the ocean on my back.

Judy: Then I think it is time to part.

Author's words: At this moment Judy got a thought regarding her riot about Christian. Judy is bothered by his fate in previous life. Maybe Woman-devil is related with Christian's storie in his previous life?

Woman-devil: Yes, Of course, you may go.

Judy: I want ask you another one question.

Woman-devil: I listen you.

Judy: Do you know about my acquaintance Christian? Beatriz wanted them to go to your world and talk with you, but he refused?

Woman-devil: I heard about one human whom Beatriz wanted invite to our meeting in the ocean. But Beatriz did not say his name.

Judy: Probably she meant Christian. He told us his harsh storie and I thought maybe it is related with you.

Woman-devil: What storie?

Judy: At first I have to ask you have you been living in our world for a very long time?

Woman-devil: Yes, I have according to human measurements. I have been living here for many human years. What sharp storie about your acquaintance was this?

Judy: He was a scientist and one night in his life when he carried out his scientific deal in a forest he collided with a mystery creature. It played out very negative role in his life. He could not to continue to engage science so long as he wanted. Now he lives his next life and claims to continue doing science what he could not continue in his previous life. When he told us about this event in his previous life he described the creature which he saw. So I thought, maybe, it was one of your creatures? Can you remember all your creatures, if they are not too much?

Woman-devil: How Christian described the creature?

Judy: It was similar to a monster. But I can not describe it particularly. Sorry. I remember only such facts that it had red burning in darkness eyes and clutches. Christian was daunted with it. So he has abdicated from his engagement and run away from the forest. After that he had tangible troubles in his life. He was taken for a madman.

Woman-devil: So if it was a monster and it was related with me it means it could be only me in monster imaginary. I am very sorry.

Beatriz: May I paste my word, please?

Judy: Of course, you may.

Beatriz: I want you, Lady Devil, to notice that Judy does not want accuse you with offense. But she sincerely regrets about Christian's fate. So she wants find out the reason for this accident. Also she wants this Christian's trouble not to repeat again.

Woman-devil: I understand. I really can take monsters imaginaries at night when I go to forests and dissipate my extra-decomposers there. I did it. But I do not know how looks Christian and I do not remember how looked the people whom I saw in the forests. So I can not remember my meeting with Christian. But you have to transfer Christian from me the information that he may not to worry in the forests. If I being in a monster imaginary see people in a forest I will take not scary imaginary. And if I see that they are daunted I will calm down them. I will try not to allow them go mad.

Judy: So I was very glad to see you, Lady Devil and you, Beatriz, too. I think it is time to say good bye and part.

Beatriz: We were gald, too. Have good and durable impressions.

Author's words: Judy is getting down from the horse

Beatriz: I would like you to go to visit us and see multitude of different marine inhabitants. Also we would talk else.

Judy: Sorry, Beatriz. I think it would be interesting, but I am not sure I will have such possibility.

Beatriz: Then I just wish you good luck and long positive impressions.

Woman-devil: From me, too.

Judy: Thank you.

Author's words: Judy is going in direction to home. Woman-devil and Beatriz are flying off on the horse.
There Woman-devil, Beatriz and Lilian are sitting in the bottom of the ocean.

Woman-devil: Beatriz, can you scratch my nails on the legs?

Beatriz: Of course, I can.

Woman-devil: Then move here, please, and do it for me. Today we can talk about your last visit to your onetime host if you want

Author's words: Beatriz is swimming to Woman-devil with a cleaning stone.

Woman-devil: I wish you, Lilian, to be here, too, and to help Beatriz. I wish her to clean my nails on one my leg and you to clean my nails on my other leg.

Lilian: Yes, I understand the request. I am rushing.

Beatriz: Me too.

Woman-devil: You may not rush so much. I can wait while you reach me.

Author's words: Beatriz and Lilian give stones, awim to Woman-devil and begin clean Woman-devil's nails

Beatriz: I think there is nothing especially new. Christian is fond with his engagement as usually. Unfortunately, he did not admit proposal to go here and knew something interesting about the extra-decomposers.

Woman-devil: Did you tell him that the host of the estate is inadequate?

Beatriz: No I did not. I did not prefer to say Christian about it.

Woman-devil: So you were right that you did not dare to do that.

Beatriz: But Christian abdicated from this idea at least.

Woman-devil: It is his own right. If he does not prefer to do what you suggested him than just let him to do  what he prefers to do. How were your last days in the aquarium of your first host where you flied recently?

Beatriz: Good, Lady Devil. I spent these days in the aquarium of my host, communicated with her friends. They all met me with goodwill. We talked about my proposal as you know. Besides I communicated with animals in Helen's aquarium before my communication with the people.

Woman-devil: Do you like marine animals in her aquarium?

Beatriz: Of course, I do. But, frankly, they do not differ tangibly from the animals which I saw in the ocean.

Woman-devil: Are you serious?

Beatriz: Yes, I am serious. I communicated with the animals in the ocean about my life in the swamp. I talked with the animals in Helen's aquarium to the same topic. I told them the same what I told the animals in the ocean. I think both categories of the animals were interested in the same extent.

Woman-devil: It means there is no tangible difference between yourmconversation with the animals of one category and other one. But I have not seen yet any difference between the animals in your narrative. Maybe you wanted say that there is simillarity between them which is that all of them are equally friendly and interested in the same questions regarding to you?

Beatriz: I don't know how to say to be true. I communicated with all of them almost to the same theme. I told them almost the same about myself and my life in the swamp. It is about what I communicated with them. I communicated with them about something completely other not so much.

Woman-devil: I have no doubts that if we talk exactly about the inhabitants and not about something other what may be related with them, for example, what your communication with them. We can notice that many of them are completely different: their view, body structure, nutrition and lifestyle - the difference is very obvious.

Author's words: For some moments there was continuing silence. It was transgressed by the words of Woman-devil:

Woman-devil: But there are some similarities between all the marine animals which differ them from people. Some people are so freaks what I can not say about animals.

Lilian: What summons disturbance regarding people in you?

Woman-devil: Some people are so cruel and relentless being regarding nature! I do not ceasecontaminate nature without a good reason. I find it a quite meaningless and absurd! I do not like it! But, from other side, we have deal on this planet, thanks to this unpleasant fact.

Lilian: Is there a gravity for me regarding the host of these estate?

Woman-devil: You will be in safety if you are under water always.

Author's words: A medusa is swimming towards to Woman-devil.

Woman-devil: I did not summon you here. What do you want from me?

Medusa: I would like know about what you are telling.

Woman-devil: It is not regardless you, trust me.
It is about people who live in the houses on the bank of this lake. They are so blackguard! But I think you will never meet them because you always are in the water and he always are out of it.

Lilian: But I listened that people can swim in water and breathe in there in special hemlets.  Such people are called divers.

Woman-devil: There is an interesting question: what our host Joe has to look for here? I will arrange him a wonderful swimming!

Lilian: I think we must retreat this human! I do not like this fact that he can imbue here.

Woman-devil: I do not like it, too. But I will take measures over this fact.

People who live on the banks of our ocean contributed to its pollution. They use the banks as a dump. There is so much litter and carrion here: waste from different jetsam of these people, corpses of died animals and people!

Lilian: People are a terrific kind of life! It is terrible! How is it possible to contaminatewhen nature when you can escape this?

Medusa: I have literally nothing to spoil live nature.

Woman-devil: Yes, really, people are a terrific life specie. But there is explaination how can they be able  to do what representatives of other species can not do. Human nature is not what is nature of the special marine creature like you.  Besides there is such fact that human life goes on not in the same world where your life goes on, what is a very important  circumstance.

Lilian: You, must be, went to the human world to stop such people as Joe?

Woman-devil: Yes, of course. We intend to do this.

Lilian: What should we do with Joe?

Beatriz: How will you stop him?

Woman-devil: I will engage him. I reflected about this question and I have concluded that I can talk with him and propel him to stop beastliness. Maybe you will trust me soon, maybe you will not. Don't worry, please. Anything will be all right.

Beatriz: How will you stop him?

Woman-devil: I will not let him to imbue here too deeply. Moreover there will be no necessarity for him to tamper in this lake according to my purposes. I will talk with him out and very far from this lake

Medusa: You can live out of water and speak with people! It is surprising!

Woman-devil: Of course, I can. Why not? Beatriz and Lilian can, too. But, of course, it is better for them to keep in the lake and not to stick out.

Medusa: I can defense myself through my stinging tentacles!

Woman-devil: You will not have to do this. I will not let Joe to imbue there.

Lilian: Did Joe told you why he has became a scoundrel?

Woman-devil: No, he did not.

Medusa: What storie was this with him?

Woman-devil: Do you mean an event in the result of which he has became such human?

Medusa: Yes. What storie was this with him?

Woman-devil: I don't know for sure.

Lilian: But, may be, there are some hypothesis?

Woman-devil: I will find it out when I talk with him. Also I will not let him to spoil nature. Frankly I have already tired from this beastliness.

Beatriz: We wish you to be successfull.

Woman-devil: Thank you.

Lilian: But it means we loose our urge to refine nature. What will we do if this beastliness finishes?

Woman-devil: Do not worry. We will decide what will you do. You, Lilian, can live without refinement. Beatriz can became a human or somebody like me.

Beatriz: It is wonderful that I can do it!

Woman-devil: You can't, unfortunately. Do not take offense at me, please. But it is true that Beatriz was a human earlier. Now she would like to be a human again. You have never been somebody except a mermaid.
But I think life will not be pious after we complete our mission.

Medusa: I think so. It is enough enthralling in this water space!

Beatriz: So, we are going to terminate our mission and rebuild our life and life purposes?

Woman-devil: Yes, of course. It is not so interesting if it is the same during the whole life.

Beatriz: I am interested about my life in human incarnation at near future. Will I have parents at least adoptive ones?

Woman-devil: I think, you will. We will seek adoptive parents for you. I hope we will find somebody.

Lilian: I wonder if I can live without carrion.

Woman-devil: You can, trust me. But you can not know so much about yourself as me just basing only on your own feelings.

Beatriz: I will miss you, Lady Devil, when I live with adoptive parents.

Woman-devil: I will miss you, too.

Beatriz: Will we have a possibility to meet again someday?

Woman-devil: It is not a very high probability.

Author's words: This morning Joe went to the train station. There will be something unexpectable for him in the station, but he has not know about it yet.

Voice on the terminal: Do not be daunted by the snake. It is not a hazard for you.

Author's words: Joe turned and saw that there is a big snake creeping straight to him. He began silently watch in it. When the snake had precipitated to him it began talk with him.

Joe: What do you want from me?

Snake: We must get acquainted and discuss something.

Author's words: Joe was daunted, of course, how can this snake know about his personal dark life.

Joe: Are you trying to imbue me that you are not black entity for a human despite the denomination which you are called?
